summary: This is an email chain regarding the Finest Foundation Awards ceremony on November 9, 2021, where investigators from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force are being recognized for their work on the Epstein case. The document shows internal praise and logistical planning for the award event.

persons.name: Det
persons.context: One of the investigators being congratulated and recognized with an award for work on the Epstein case.

connections.description: Both are investigators on the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force recognized together for their work on the Epstein case.

events.title: Finest Foundation Awards Ceremony
events.description: Awards ceremony at 1 PP Auditorium where investigators from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force are recognized for their work on the Epstein case.

keyFacts: Investigators from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force are being awarded for their work on the Epstein case in November 2021.
The awards ceremony is organized by the Finest Foundation and includes parking and lunch for recipients and their guests.
The email chain shows internal recognition and appreciation for the hard work done on the Epstein investigation years after the initial case developments.
